attributes.action: LEAVE ALL DISABILITY BENEFITS ALONE. / NO CHANGES TO BENEFITS
attributes.additional_details: Vulnerable people, Disabled People and those who are UNABLE to work are going to be destroyed by your lack of empathy and sheer ignorance to those of us who DESERVE the support. It’s hard enough as it is trying to claim P.I.P but to take it away entirely is simply disgusting.
attributes.background: P.I.P and UC should NOT be taken away from the people who need it the most. As a Government, you are supposed to HELP people, not destroy what little they have left.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
